Episodes.Title: I'm Leslie Knope
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie decides to run for political office, which means that she has to break up with Ben. Meanwhile, Ron goes into hiding from Tammy 1, and Tom tries to recruit Andy for his latest business venture.

Episodes.Title: Ron and Tammys
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ron becomes a wimp after he and Tammy 1 get back together and Leslie tries to save him, Ben discovers that Tom's business is hemorrhaging money, and Ann has a frustrating experience shooting a diabetes PSA with Chris.

Episodes.Title: Born and Raised
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Aisha Muharrar
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie is accused of not being born in Pawnee while she is trying to promote her new book about the city. Meanwhile, Ann tries in vain to have a five-minute conversation with Ron and April.

Episodes.Title: Pawnee Rangers
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ron's Pawnee Rangers and Leslie's competing scout group, the Pawnee Goddesses, share a weekend in the wilderness, Ben joins Tom and Donna on "Treat Yo Self Day," and Chris takes an interest in Jerry's daughter.

Episodes.Title: Meet 'N' Greet
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Katie Dippold
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's opportunity to stump for votes in the business community is sabotaged by Tom, who wants to promote Entertainment 7Twenty. Meanwhile, Andy and April throw a Halloween party, but don't give Ben advance notice.

Episodes.Title: End of the World
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: A cult predicting the end of the world reserves a park, Leslie becomes jealous when another woman takes interest in Ben, Tom throws a huge party for the closing of Entertainment 7Twenty, and Andy and April try to do something stupid.

Episodes.Title: The Treaty
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ben argue over their relationship and ruin the high school Model U.N. they are hosting, Chris wonders where his relationship with Jerry's daughter is going wrong, and Ron tries to get Tom to take back his old job.

Episodes.Title: Smallest Park
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Chelsea Peretti
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie tries to manipulate a new park project to extend her working relationship with Ben, Tom and Jerry work together to create a new department logo, and Andy tries to find the right college course to sign up for.

Episodes.Title: The Trial of Leslie Knope
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Chris brings Leslie up on ethics charges for her relationship with Ben.

Episodes.Title: Citizen Knope
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dave King
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie tries to keep herself busy during her suspension from the department, but gets some bad news about her campaign. Meanwhile, Ben searches for a job in the private sector, and the office makes the perfect Christmas gift for L...

Episodes.Title: The Comeback Kid
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Mike Scully
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie appoints Ann as her new campaign manager, but her attempt to relaunch the campaign goes off to a horrendous start, while Chris discovers that Ben is depressed after leaving his job.

Episodes.Title: Campaign Ad
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Alan Yang
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie tries to keep Ben from making a negative campaign ad against a popular new candidate, Andy takes a visit to the doctor, and Ron becomes uncomfortable when Chris suddenly starts trying to hang out with him.

Episodes.Title: Bowling for Votes
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Katie Dippold
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie unsuccessfully tries to win over a focus group member who made a negative comment by going bowling with him, and Chris gets some bad relationship news while calling for campaign donations.

Episodes.Title: Operation Ann
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Aisha Muharrar
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Ann's friends try to set her up on a date for Valentine's Day, while Ron and Andy try to help Ben solve Leslie's series of complicated riddles to reveal the location of their Valentine's Day date.

Episodes.Title: Dave Returns
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Harris Wittels
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: While Leslie tries to get an endorsement from the police chief, Dave returns to tell Leslie that he's still in love with her. Meanwhile, Andy tries to put together a campaign theme song.

Episodes.Title: Sweet Sixteen
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Norm Hiscock
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's attempts to balance her campaign with her job results in major blunders on both fronts, Chris becomes attached to Andy's dog Champion, and April gets fed up with Tom and Ann coming to her for relationship advice.

Episodes.Title: Campaign Shake-Up
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dan Goor
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie and Ben have their work cut out for them when Bobby Newport hires a Washington professional as his campaign manager, while Ron gets the department to tackle a project in Leslie's absence to get Chris off his back.

Episodes.Title: Lucky
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Nick Offerman
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's campaign could be in big trouble when she records a TV interview after a couple of drinks. Meanwhile, April tries to set Chris up with Andy's women's studies professor, but things go unexpectedly.

Episodes.Title: Live Ammo
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Dave King
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie could pay a steep political price for saving the Parks Department budget from getting cut, and Chris considers Ron for a promotion--which could actually be short-lived.

Episodes.Title: The Debate
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Amy Poehler
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: The candidates debate on television; Chris, Anne, and Tom act as Leslie's "spin team" for the media. Meanwhile, Ron, April, Donna, and Andy throw a party for Leslie's campaign supporters, but experience a few set backs in the proc...

Episodes.Title: Bus Tour
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Aisha Muharrar
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: Leslie's campaign momentum is halted when Bobby Newport's dad dies a couple of days before the election, and Andy tries to figure out who tried to throw a pie at Leslie on the campaign trail.

Episodes.Title: Win, Lose or Draw
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur
Episodes.Actors: Amy Poehler, Rashida Jones, Aziz Ansari
Episodes.Plot: It's election day for Leslie, and Ben is contemplating an offer to help work on a campaign in Washington. Meanwhile, Andy tries to help April rescue the files she deleted from the Parks Department computers.
